description.value: Once per session, the character can choose a single target individual within line of sight as the target of their vigil. They may only target one such character at a time. Once per encounter they may make a Standard Attack against this target as a Reaction whilst gaining the benefits of a Full Action Aim (+20 to WS/BS Test) for this attack.
